{"step_by_step_thinking": "To diagnose CSF leakage, various methods can be used including imaging techniques, chemical tests of bodily fluid, and clinical examination. Tram Line is not a diagnostic method for CSF leakage. β 2- transferrin level is a biomarker that can be used to identify and confirm CSF leakage. Glucose level is not a reliable diagnostic test for CSF leakage. Protein level can be elevated in CSF analysis of patients with CSF leakage. Therefore, the correct answer is C. increase in glucose.", "answer_choice": "C"}
